name: Doll House
description:
You're a kid waking up late to sneak downstairs and grab cookies after your mother goes to sleep. Except you didn't realize how many spooks there were in your house at night!

Team:

Andrew Mescall - A 3D Model Boi & title-maker!

Misha Favorov - Wow look at him use Unity!

Olivia Zuern - How did you make so much furniture so fast?? Level design!! Unity also!!

Sarina Vail - ooOOo 2D art! Textures!
